mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, comm.* from ( select * from community order by post_id desc) comm) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update community set read_count = read_count + 1 where post_id=#{post_id}
update community set nick=#{nick}, title=#{title}, content=#{content},category=#{category}, reg_date=sysdate where post_id=#{post_id}
